pricings.name: One Off
pricings.label: Per project, one time purchase.
pricings.description: Perfect for startups and business that need a better websites with minimum feature for one time purchase.

pricings.name: Hourly
pricings.label: Per hour, per project.
pricings.description: Best for simple and small projects that need to upgrade, maintenance, changes and also update. Perfect for enterprises and agencies.

pricings.name: Subscription
pricings.label: Per month, unlimted requests.
pricings.description: For startups, businesses, and agencies that need to craft multiple websites within a short period of time. Perfect for long terms requests.

pricings.name: Custom
pricings.label: Contract, custom requests.
pricings.description: Best for custom request sites with huge features and complex designs. Works with custom requirements and timelines
